__e: My brother told me about this new sushi place on King, and, well, it's always full.
Which means we don't fall for the "bad sushi" move ever.
Actually, I've had sushi on the brain for three days.
Last night I had a dream I was eating sushi, and when I asked what kind of fish was in it, the waiter said it was human flesh, and I liked it.
Today's the big day that I'm heading to New York to attend a party with sushi and important people.
I was in the toilet and saw that bastard... and that sushi boy, and a woman, many people were there.
This is worse than the time I had to eat grocery store sushi.
How about we get some Sushi from that place across the street?
By the way, that's not dog food. It's yesterday's sushi.
